@SsnL so you are also modifying the implementation of interpolate for the grid_sample modifications? Because what I'm proposing here doesn't touch grid_sample, only the *Upsample* kernels in THNN / THCUNN.

The way I'd see this task would be to avoid porting everything to ATen initially (because it has a lot of code duplication that we would like to avoid), and instead start roughly "from scratch" leveraging the current implementation as a reference.

body:
@SsnL so you are also modifying the implementation of `interpolate` for the `grid_sample` modifications? Because what I'm proposing here doesn't touch `grid_sample`, only the `*Upsample*` kernels in THNN / THCUNN.

The way I'd see this task would be to avoid porting everything to ATen initially (because it has a lot of code duplication that we would like to avoid), and instead start roughly "from scratch" leveraging the current implementation as a reference.
